blocks.title: Who am I
blocks.subtitle: Bio
blocks.summary: Web designer | Web developer | Logo Design
blocks.text: Freelance website builder and logo designer from Belgium. With a bachelor's degree in Software Engineering and years of professional work experience, I deliver tailor-made digital solutions focusing on your business' needs. I perform various roles: web designer, web developer, logo designer, etc.

blocks.title: Why me
blocks.subtitle: Selling points
blocks.text: I am a freelancer/self-employed with my own web agency. This means that unlike a software agency/company, I am your sole person to communicate and work with. I provide various types of digital solutions. Whether it's simple business websites, administration apps with login systems, food delivery apps, webshops, etc., with excellent SEO scores. In other words, anything that needs to appear on the screen online/offline, I complete it. A digital solution doesn't necessarily have to be 'a business website'. Ultimately, with the right technologies behind my back, hosting can be extremely cheap or even free.
